findings.title: Multiplication overflow check fails to handle zero
findings.description: When determining the total amount of each asset to transfer, a multiplication is performed. The result of this multiplication is checked for overflow, but that check fails to handle a zero.

findings.title: Lack of threat model creation
findings.description: The creation of a threat model is beneficial when building smart contract systems as it helps to understand potential security threats, assess risk, and identify appropriate mitigation strategies.
